bug.author: alepiscopo
bug.summary: Wrong Wikidata dump format references in `wikidata_pretrain_kb.py`
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>How to reproduce the behaviour</denchmark-h>
Run bin/wiki_entity_linking/wikidata_pretrain_kb.py: steps 1-3 runs with no issues; Step 4 raises an error while reading the Wikidata dumps file: OSError: Not a gzipped file (b'BZ') This is because the docstring at the beginning of the script suggests to download the dumps in bz2 format: For the Wikidata dump: get the latest-all.json.bz2 from https://dumps.wikimedia.org/wikidatawiki/entities/ However, the script expects them to be in gz and uses the gzip library to open them. <denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
spaCy version: 2.2.1 Platform: Linux-4.15.0-1037-gcp-x86_64-with-Ubuntu-18.04-bionic Python version: 3.6.8
